History is a half studio and half compilation! Ok, fine, put this in the studio section, but king of pop and those re-releases are all right and its good to let the fans know what is what, man
its not your article! Stop doing this, you have been warned sooo many times
Realist2, pleas do not play with my article
dont, history is a studio album
/* Studio albums */ 1972 was the actual year, he put out his first SINGLE in '71...
Date the maintenance tags or general fixes
These sales figures need a source. RIAA certifications and sales figures aren't the same. The RIAA certifications are for albums shipped, rather than sales.
changing thriller sales into 55m-105m. The claims by Michael Jackson's management is equally credible; another Guinness (2007 I believe) put it at 65m, so I'm not sure about the 55m figure..whatever.
/* Studio albums */ One of the MJ sites said it's around 8,000,000.
/* Studio albums */ Actual sales of the albums are where it's listed, it's only counted twice in the US as a double album so that's why that 7,000,000 figure comes up.
/* Studio albums */ Guinness says 55 million in their book.
not correctly input and new refs in any sources at the moment that i can find that are RS
/* Studio albums */ correction of serious mistakes

/* Studio albums */ It was NOT released in 1971.
